title: Roommates From Beyond - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/12/21
itunes:title: Roommates From Beyond - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/12/21
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and paranormal investigators Tonya and Joey Madia discuss a series of hauntings they had in apartments and homes across the country, episodes of sleep paralysis, and whether ghostly appearances can lead to demonic possession.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
